idlastro/

hprecess.pro


top source HPRECESS

HPRECESS, HDR, YEARF

NAME: HPRECESS PURPOSE: Precess the astrometry in a FITS header to a new equinox

CALLING SEQUENCE: HPRECESS, HDR, [ yearf ]

INPUT-OUTPUT: HDR - FITS Header, must contain the CRVAL astrometry keywords, and either an EPOCH or EQUINOX keyword. HDR will be modified to contain the precessed astrometry

OPTIONAL INPUT: YEARF - Scalar, giving the year of the new (Final) equinox. If not supplied, user will be prompted for this value.

METHOD: The CRVAL and CD (or CROTA) keywords are extracted from the header and precessed to the new equinox. The EPOCH or EQUINOX keyword in the header is updated. A HISTORY record is added

RESTRICTIONS: The FK5 reference frame is assumed for both equinoxes.

PROCEDURES USED: EXTAST, GET_EQUINOX(), SXADDPAR, SXADDHIST, PRECESS, PRECESS_CD PUTAST, ZPARCHECK REVISION HISTORY: Written W. Landsman STX July, 1988 CD matrix precessed - February, 1989 Update EQUINOX keyword when CROTA2 present November, 1992 Recognize a GSSS header June, 1994 Additional Noparams value recognize for storing CDs. RSH, 6 Apr 95 Understand reversed X,Y (X-Dec, Y-RA) axes, W. Landsman October 1998 Correct algorithm when CROTA2 is in header W. Landsman April 2006 Correct sign error introduced April 2006, include CDELT values when computing rotation of pole W. Landsman July 2007 Call hprecess/jprecess for 1950<>2000 W. L. Aug 2009

Parameters

HDR
YEARF
